channel.title: Knight vs bear results in hunter dying
channel.description:
#### What happened?
2: possessor 6: hunter 8: knight 9: observer
On n1: 8 guards 9 6 bears 2 makes 9 attack 6
Outcome: 9 attacks 6, triggers bear. bear attacks 9. 8 takes the hit from bear and attacks 6. 6 and 8 die
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
8 dies. 9 might die, depending on interpretation. 6 should survive.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments:
I don't think you should be able to die from your own bear.
